title: Para Para Paravai Ondru Lyrics NeerParavai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Para Para Paravai Ondru Lyrics
Singer: Shreya Ghosal
Movie: Neer Paravai
Music: N. R. Raghunanthan
Lyrics : Vairamuthu

Para para paravai ondru
kara kara karaiyil nindru
kanneeril kadalai ninaikudhey,

Kada Kada kadalukkulley
pada pada idhyam thaedi
kannellam thee valarthu thuddikudhey

Endhevan pona dhisayile
jeevan serthu anupinen
en jeevan vandhu seruma !!
dhegam meendum vaazhuma !!

idho endhan kanneer andha azhaiyil serum
azhai marupadi unnidam varuma (...Para para paravai )

Thanneeril valayum nirkum
Thanneeraa valayil nirkum
En dhevan eppodhum thirigiraan

Kaatrukku thamilum theriyum
Kannaalan dhisaiyum theriyum
Kattaayam thunbam sollum marakiraan

Unnadhu vervayin maarbukkul
pisukku pisukkendru kidakudhey
Eera veravaigal theerum mun
Ennadhu uyir pasi kaaivadhaa

Vaanum mannum koodum podhu
naanum neeyum koodaamal
vazhavadhu kodumai  .....Para para .....

Oorengum mazhayum illai
Verungum puyalum illai
Endraalum nenjil idi idikudhey

Kannaalan nilamai enna
Kadalodu paarthu solla
Kokkukum naaraikum kan alayudhey

Neerin magan enhan kaadhalan
Neerin karunayil vazhvaan
Indru naalaikul meeluvaan
Enadhu penmayayai aaluvaan

Ennai meendum theeendum podhu
Kadal dhevan iru murai
mudhal Iravugal tharuvaan

seo.description: Get the complete Para Para Paravai Ondru Lyrics NeerParavai Songs Lyrics from Neer Paravai. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by N. R. Raghunanthan and sung by Shreya Goshal. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Neer Paravai, N. R. Raghunanthan, Shreya Goshal, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
